entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:42 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -17.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pickle Lake Airport 2:46 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -17.7°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 75 %

Dewpoint: -21.0°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
